channel.title: Comments on: Queer Novellas by Queer Authors
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Authors To Read That Don’t Conform to the Gender Binary – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: Authors To Read That Don’t Conform to the Gender Binary – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] a soft spot for Neon Yang, not because they wrote the Tensorate Series which I’ve recommended in an earlier post, but because they wrote a short story with GIANT ROBOTS. As a long-time fan of Gundam, giant robots […]
item.content:encoded: […] a soft spot for Neon Yang, not because they wrote the Tensorate Series which I’ve recommended in an earlier post, but because they wrote a short story with GIANT ROBOTS. As a long-time fan of Gundam, giant robots […]

item.title: By: Anne Elise
item.dc:creator: Anne Elise
item.description: I cannot WAIT to read these JY Yang novels, they sound amazing. Great recommendation!
item.content:encoded: I cannot WAIT to read these JY Yang novels, they sound amazing. Great recommendation!
